pkgmetadata.longdescription: Higher Order Assortativity for Complex Networks // Allows to evaluate Higher Order Assortativity of complex networks defined through objects of class 'igraph' from the package of the same name. The package returns a result also for directed and weighted graphs. References, Arcagni, A., Grassi, R., Stefani, S., Torriero, A. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.ejor.2017.04.028 Arcagni, A., Grassi, R., Stefani, S., Torriero, A. (2021) doi:10.1016/j.jbusres.2019.10.008 Arcagni, A., Cerqueti, R., Grassi, R. (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2304.01737.
